mapper.select: SELECT authority_cd, authority_nm, description, create_dt, create_id, update_dt, update_id FROM authority WHERE UPPER(del_yn) = UPPER('N') AND authority_cd > 0

SELECT authority_cd, authority_nm, description, del_yn, create_dt, create_id, update_dt, update_id FROM authority WHERE authority_cd = #{authorityCd} AND UPPER(del_yn) = UPPER('N') AND authority_cd > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO authority( authority_cd, authority_nm, description, create_dt, create_id, update_dt, update_id ) VALUES ( seq_authority_cd.NEXTVAL, #{authorityNm}, #{description}, SYSDATE, #{createId}, #{updateDt}, #{updateId} );
